name: Dr. Coad's Oatmeal Cookies with Chocolate Chips and Dried Cranberries
description: [Photograph: Robyn Lee] Swapped at the 2011 SE cookie swap by Zoe Bain. "My high school art history teacher (Dr. Coad) shared this recipe with me years ago and I've been making them ever since!"...

recipeInstructions.text: Separately combine eggs, vanilla, and milk, then add to butter/sugar mixture.
Separately mix and or sift flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and add to previous mixture in thirds.
Then add chocolate chips, dried cranberries and orange zest, and pecans (if using).
Drop by rounded tablespoon on prepared cookie sheets and bake in a 350 degree oven for 12-14 minutes or until cookies turn golden brown.
